name: Companion (itch) (random one guy, Aleyssu, ATNoName, Nina0917)
name_original: Companion (itch) (random one guy, Aleyssu, ATNoName, Nina0917)
description:
B to Stay, N to Follow, M to Hunt.

Companion is a platformer that relies on double jumps and quick wits to navigate the game’s levels. You must manipulate your AI companion to kill enemies and escape from the dungeon.

Made by Tim, Alan, Alex, and Nina
